stats.name: fumbles
stats.description: The number of times a player/team has fumbled the ball

stats.name: fumblesLost
stats.description: The number of times a fumble is recovered by the opposing team

stats.name: fumblesTouchdowns
stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: offensiveTwoPtReturns
stats.description: The number of two point attempts that is returned by the offense.

stats.name: offensiveFumblesTouchdowns
stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown by the offense.

stats.name: defensiveFumblesTouchdowns
stats.description: The number of times a fumbles is recovered and returned for a touchdown by the defense.

stats.name: avgGain
stats.description: The average gained yards per position.

stats.name: completionPct
stats.description: The percentage of completed passes.

stats.name: completions
stats.description: The times a player completes a pass to another player who is eligible to catch a pass.

stats.name: ESPNQBRating
stats.description: The quarterback rating used to compare overall offensive performance relative to other positions.

stats.name: interceptionPct
stats.description: The percentage of passes thrown that were intercepted by the opposing team.

stats.name: interceptions
stats.description: The number of passes thrown that were intercepted by the opposing team.

stats.name: longPassing
stats.description: The longest pass play completed in terms of yards.

stats.name: miscYards
stats.description: The number of miscellaneous yards.

stats.name: netPassingYards
stats.description: The amount of net passing yards.

stats.description: The amount of net passing yards per game.

stats.description: The amount of net total yards.

stats.description: The amount of net total yards per game.

stats.description: The number of times a pass is attempted.

stats.name: passingBigPlays
stats.description: The number of times a pass results in a big play.

stats.description: The number of times the ball has been fumbled after a completed pass.

stats.name: passingFumblesLost
stats.description: The number of times the ball has been fumbled and lost to the opposing team after a completed pass.

stats.name: passingTouchdownPct
stats.description: The percentage of passes that result in a touchdown.
